Title: The Wife
Plot: A girlfriend poses as Jerry's wife so she can get a dry cleaning discount. George uses the shower at the health club as a bathroom and is afraid of being turned in after being seen. Elaine is getting mixed signals from a male friend who may be interested. Kramer's getting ready to impress his girlfriend's parents.
GuestStars: Lawrence Mandley, Barney Martin, Liz Sheridan, Len Lesser, Courteney Cox, Scott LaRose, Joseph Ragno, Rebecca Glenn, Nick LaTour, Susan Segal, Lili Bernard
